gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Magic 105, Heat 87
gameRecap.excerpt: The Magic defeated the Heat, 105-87. Paolo Banchero recorded 20 points (3-5 3PM) and 10 rebounds for the Magic, with Franz Wagner adding 19 points, five assists, and two rebounds in the victory. Bam Adebayo tallied 22 points, 11 rebounds, and seven assists for the Heat in the losing effort. The Magic improve to 23-20, while the Heat fall to 24-19.
